description:
It’s easy to learn, fun to play, sometimes a bit challenging, but always hard to stop!

Help the friendly godlike Hix restore all the beautiful islands all around the world in this unique puzzle game! Solve puzzles to find out why your devilish brother DIX is messing up the islands and what exactly happened in this charming puzzle adventure.

Clean up the world never felt so satisfying! 

FEATURES YOU”LL LOVE
● Easy to learn and addictive gameplay 
● 180 levels with varying difficulty
●  6 differently themed worlds 
●  Relaxing audio & sounds effects while playing
●  Difficulty is suitable for all ages
●  Unlimited hints, never get stuck 
●  Unlimited time, puzzling should be relaxing
●  Play everywhere! No WIFI or Internet required
●  No in game sales, no-advertisements or irritating popups
●  Fun rewards and objects to discover

CRITICS & PLAYERS LOVE IT!
“Highly polished game with a lot of charm!” – Pocket Gamer 
“Well-made mechanics, and a strong core!” – Big Indie Pitch
“Hot New game!” – TouchArcade
“Hix eines der besten Puzzle-Spiele, die es in diesem Jahr in den App Store geschafft haben” – Appgefahren
“I love HIX, and I baked you a an apple pie!” – Our Moms
name: HIX: Puzzle Islands
